title: Business and Marketing Technology: Survey of Business
subject: CTE (2020-)

1E4C932DFDE640BFB820F0F08740B302.description:
Explain the pros and cons of cloud computing and
discuss potential security and privacy concerns especially
with regards to syncing devices.

1A2B92C476464C6D8ABFFAAA57D0DB53.description:
Identify apps that can be used to
manage time, tasks, and projects.

C19B5DA9B3D94783BFABF43659A268AC.description:
Compare and contrast cloud
storage options such as Google Drive,
OneDrive, and Dropbox.

D971F5FFA4C34DB591559996BD9C4CA1.description:
Utilize various cloud storage options that would be used in the business and marketing programs of study: Accounting,
Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office Administration, Social Media
and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

BF29C64F51E640D19C65394152822C89.description:
Collaborate with a team to create a cloud based
project.

E2F5800BF3764245A4A94EB07B1771F7.description: Create various projects using cloud applications.

44A64556CD4546B5BF635B4BCA77A706.description:
Discuss and use available cloud computing
applications (e.g., Google, Office 365, Prezi, etc.).

4804F7CEA0CD4EBF9E6E9C3A2F409828.description: Explore cloud-computing applications as they relate to word processing, spreadsheets, database, and presentations.

076CE1C6017F4F1591AF71F6460B7C13.description:
Prepare a presentation so that it can be
presented effectively without the use of a projector,
sound, etc. (i.e. know the content, know the
audience, be prepared with handouts of
presentation)

4A2B824142D74438B5982538575F0363.description:
Deliver effective presentations using proper
body language and verbal and written
communication techniques.

5064800CA467455185AD1A25CBCF748A.description:
Develop effective presentation skills that would be used in the business and marketing programs of study: Accounting,
Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office Administration, Social Media
and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

18463929CC4C4668A20FE5A86C5CAB0C.description:
Manage images and objects by changing the
order/stacking, aligning and group objects.

CB54434153D343818E2157527ABF1226.description:
Configure playback options for audio and
video.

413A1AB96ED3477495C56E89F01F14A8.description:
Create slideshow with multimedia and
graphics such as audio and video, images, charts
and tables.

4390D4CE234846ADA97BCFB083F2A28D.description:
Organize and enhance the planning of
presentations using features such as create and
rename sections, create and modify slide layouts,
modify handout and notes master, insert and
review comments, inspect and protect a
presentation, export to other formats, configure
slide show options, create custom slide shows,
reorder animations, and hide/unhide slides.

851E23FECA7342FFBB4F164778E29556.description:
Create presentations with hyperlinks that link
to other slides and to external files and/or web
pages.

BB360B689E504DE786D26019B9D8F153.description:
Insert slide headers, footers, and page
numbers.

7F48C0407BDE42F5B35F697C673F1FEB.description:
Use the slide master feature to modify slides. Complete the
appropriate lessons/activities in the GCFGlobal PowerPoint Tutorial

075B7F8DED92412F936913CDD2811C13.description:
Employ advanced presentation software skills to create presentations that would be used in the business and marketing
programs of study: Accounting, Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office
Administration, Social Media and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

961129E8075E4E9A856012B6B720349A.description:
Create slide shows that employ appropriate
transitions and animations and that use automatic
and rehearsed timings.

34F7C4F3423D4EF3A6D297A0D54B40AE.description:
Demonstrate consistency and simplicity by
incorporating the 7x7 rule, professional style fonts,
and appropriate backgrounds to effectively
communicate the presentation’s purpose.

47D1E923437B496A88055D29E074DED2.description: Create professional presentations in deliverable format.

0A00322E9150498A8F8707D7CEE0C97D.description:
Use various view and print options; normal
view, slide show view, slide sorter view, presenter
view; print slides, handouts, notes, outlines, print in
color, grayscale, black and white.

EC3FB224D3EB4593A6B5B3A6720B7464.description:
Create presentations using integration
features such as import slides from an outline and
other presentations, create a presentation from an
outline in a word processing program, link to a
spreadsheet graph, etc.

65DA746848D34A63ADCDB9F79BF2A444.description:
Utilize save, save as, save as different file
types; file properties

135939DF9A5B4C1796C516E971C46625.description:
Compose email messages that contain
attachments.

E06088DE02104C26B8D6BD0FA5156310.description:
Use productivity software to manage
contacts, create distribution lists, and schedule
email messages to be sent at a later date.

FA9A77FA5D81430BA5CB45EFA44B2578.description:
Use an email application, such as Microsoft
Outlook, to create and format email messages in a
variety of text formats (e.g. RTF, HTML, Plain
Text).

3AAF677C3CEE409F88530E185260B0FE.description: Use productivity software for communication purposes.

527742E130444CED9E94B777E16B5BAE.description: Generate reports displaying information in a usable format.

53871ED95DAA4036A77D7B305FA285E0.description:
Construct queries to find specific
information (use AND, OR, , =).

CEE5787B7AF241D6B8F549CFEE63A29F.description:
Identify information needs specific to each
business and marketing program of study. Discuss
ethical, privacy, and even financial concerns
involved in managing data.

EA755DACC29C4AB48D93AF2930B3787B.description:
Import and export data from and into a
database.

A7EE8599974B4C27A0C55171F8F9EF87.description:
Identify and locate the parts of a database
(e.g., tables, forms, queries, reports, data types,
fields, records, primary key).

1F705DB598EF4BBE857A32EDF4042277.description:
Create spreadsheets as they would be used
in each of the business and marketing programs of
study, (e.g., income statements, balance sheets,
payroll registers, inventory logs, stock portfolio
tracking, etc.)

DFB07026ECA34EC9B50FF59B7BD5950C.description:
Devise formulas using relative and absolute
cell referencing; autofill formulas.

4B6839B2F78D457E8E7A0D1B7B7A3793.description:
Explain and practice the mathematical order
of operations and utilize it in creating spreadsheet
formulas.

DD69286EFC0B4614945A27BAF03FFFA8.description:
Incorporate basic functions and formulas into spreadsheets that could be used in the business and marketing programs
of study: Accounting, Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office
Administration, Social Media and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

584CBA5A5E494B6CA612F800CB7483EB.description:
Insert and format charts such as
adding/modifying chart elements, adding additional
data series, move charts, apply chart layouts and
styles.

6EF4D23C3C964767A40BC657DF6199A7.description:
Design a worksheet that contains pictures
and other graphics; format pictures and graphics in
the worksheet.

EDDDFA72C767496D9DC73B269DD14EEF.description:
Use print features such as print all or part of
a workbook (print area, print selection, etc.) print
titles, print scaling, and page setup.

72A3F5F804114291A3AD7EF2DAA67EA8.description:
Demonstrate save, save as, saving
alternative file types; file properties.

6D860624F03848E9A19E39175993C092.description:
Design and arrange a worksheet by utilizing
formatting features such as insert/delete rows and
columns, adjust height and width, merge cells,
hide/unhide rows and columns, headers and
footers, rename tabs, change worksheet tab color,
add/delete a worksheet, copy/move worksheets,
views, split and freeze panes.

2B7E57E44CE1424988AC3E5A906F69C5.description:
Employ basic formatting such as font, font
size, font style and color, format painter, format
numbers, cell styles, insert/delete cells, wrap text,
cell alignment, etc.

BDF8366C0BB54530858036DB09FBE633.description:
Categorize the types of data in a
spreadsheet (labels, values)

9FE3443201F54AB8875CC90BA70F3AAF.description:
Identify and locate the parts of the
spreadsheet (rows, columns, cells, ranges,
worksheets, workbooks)

2A5E2DC1EC4D4088B032BE1C04B5CCF7.description:
Produce documents using mail merge
(expert level).

826065CBA4FB4CAA99D7F6BE71F5DA0A.description:
Create and format tables: apply borders and
shading, convert text to tables, convert tables to
text, use formulas, merge/split cells, etc.

514AEB1FBDDE4E0EBFD037BF526D1074.description:
Apply advanced formatting in documents:
hyperlinks, captions, watermarks, borders and
shading to paragraphs and documents, citations,
protect documents, endnotes/footnotes,
bookmarks; add alternative titles/text.

A1B18ACD909B463386E0CBF23A04A8DB.description:
Create, format and print envelopes and
mailing labels, name tags, inventory tags, etc.

874FA60390A141F789E41F6B4236BE09.description:
Create a template from a blank document
and use it to create subsequent documents.

457E086DC311493BBF9587C6D488D09A.description:
Practice desktop publishing skills to prepare
business documents (e.g., newsletters, flyers,
brochures, business cards, invoice, receipt,
greeting card, press release, order form, bill of
sale, meeting minutes, etc.) applicable to business
and marketing programs of study.

AD62C0CA67B648A7BB457C05FE8C816E.description:
Apply word processing skills to create
business documents (e.g., block style business
letters, memos, reports, resumes, and cover
letters).

69A6439EC9754BD4875D453AE4B117FD.description:
Create business documents in appropriate format that would be used in the business and marketing programs of study:
Accounting, Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office Administration,
Social Media and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

5689912975754CDDAC2A9B3A112819C7.description:
Manipulate a document using images, text
boxes, graphics, symbols, special characters.

810E0819956B4DBBBCE0EA38A37C58C4.description:
Demonstrate editing features such as cut,
copy and paste; drag and drop; find and replace; spelling and grammar check; thesaurus; show/hide
formatting marks; keyboard shortcuts.

0EA53AE1510F47F39F4E038772FBD6C9.description: Revise and enhance documents using basic features.

1169CC4A632744189B8DCBB24E4AF506.description:
Demonstrate save, save as, save as
alternative file types, print all parts of a document;
assign file properties, use different document
views.

F0422C2C109B4AE99F1BEDD21E0C8370.description:
Apply document formatting such as page
numbering, columns, breaks, page alignments,
headers & footers, orientations, page size,
margins, page setup, themes.

F87F6817E75149CB8E4085DDD699912C.description:
Apply document formatting such as page
numbering, columns, breaks, page alignments,
headers & footers, orientations, page size,
margins, page setup, themes.

723687FCEB7D43C98FDD106A9B9797DF.description:
Discuss and utilize primary operating system
functions: date/time, notification area, printer status
notification, connectivity notification, print screen,
calculator, snipping tool (if available), etc.

202BC3D279F94686837EB481C41A8244.description: Move, copy, delete, sort and search for files.

A59E7980EACF47D4AE85B0DA2C592EE1.description:
Create, delete, sort, copy, move, search, and
maintain folders, paying attention to hierarchy of
main folders and subfolders.

4CCDC5CB5AFF4D658D0C262729171FB3.description:
Explain the importance of efficient and
organized file management.

B397348F08B4497885E821E17D5FEEAB.description: Use the features of the operating system for efficient file management and to increase productivity in the workplace.

3C844A82A97D49CEBD603021A25C98E8.description:
Describe cyber bullying and discuss ways
to prevent it

E1AFB66AF8E1420CA7C07A125DC7D13C.description:
Explain digital citizenship and contrast
good and bad digital citizenship.

0F7357959AC14673800788CF89A6B64C.description:
Understand and explain the risk (economic
and security) viruses and malware, hacking,
phishing, and identity theft.

04EBF1A090BC4123AE3809C42FDCA7E6.description:
Demonstrate effective and safe online practices within each of the business and marketing programs of study:
Accounting, Banking, Entrepreneurship, Hospitality and Tourism, Management, Marketing, Office Administration, Medical Office Administration,
Social Media and Communications, Web Technologies, and Securities, Investments, Risk and Insurance.

41EC2DCEA57D402CBA7334BE6CA31F32.description:
Prepare career-oriented documents
and practice related activities, such as a
letter of application, resume, follow-up letter,
job interview strategies, digital portfolio, etc.
Explore and utilize online resume builders
and apps.

81E8F62824804364A5B832283B7D2769.description: Develop a plan for marketing yourself.

D2D9BE2A160040A2B3FE9C6EC789FA6E.description:
Understand, explain, and demonstrate the
concept and importance of digital presence.

676B60C9024249BFAFB992FA205E8CFC.description:
Participate in quarterly work skills
evaluations (Evaluations should be similar to
employee performance reviews used in the
workplace)

B6C7CF6775104368A57B264531304F11.description:
Understand the concept of teamwork in the
workplace.

1B4C0B9D469B4AB7AE01C3CC7CBAE36F.description:
Describe integrity, ethical leadership, and the
importance of these in one’s career and business;
evaluate real-world scenarios and discuss the
ethical considerations involved in those situations.

3E97CCAB66AB44B9B7B76A0F4BEE0A1E.description:
Comprehend and explain the importance of
punctuality and attendance.

70FD178B9BF649C899A308D1C5993D41.description:
Demonstrate effective communication
skills through writing, speaking, listening and
reading

A9D1C16E2D574363A449720E255AA966.description: Develop employability skills for success in business careers (soft skills).

635827DC64C54DB09D4F87664DE8DEA1.description:
Discuss and evaluate CTSO activities
which reinforce and connect real world
application to the curriculum taught in the
classroom. Research CTSO competitive
events and identify sources to help prepare
for success in competitive events.

8A09ADB46566454FB835E53BD7C29F76.description:
Research the Career and Technical
Student Organizations and draw connections
between participation and success. Identify
and discuss successful professionals and
their involvement in either FBLA or DECA.

A5DFFA476B2D4893BA17E594D88B9BD0.description: Recognize and discuss the academic and professional benefits of participating in a CTSO.
